list.exp: 进入淡水前欧洲鳗鲡变成鳗线
list.abs: ...有如玻璃鳗(glass eels)，欧洲鳗鲡可以到达欧洲沿岸及进入河口。进入淡水前欧洲鳗鲡变成鳗线(elvers)。她们把大半生花在淡水中.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: variant of dialect eel-fare 'the passage of young eels up a river', also 'a brood of young eels', from eel + fare in its original sense 'a journey'

means.word_mean: 1. young eel; may be sauteed or batter-fried
